site_name:
Former Victoria House
388 Malden Road
Cheam
Sutton
SM3 8HY
description: Application for full planning permission for comprehensive mixed-use redevelopment comprising: erection of a part four (4) part seven (7) storey mixed use building with 74 residential units (Use Class C3) in a mix of 1 and 2 bedroomed flats (including affordable units) and up to 256sq.m. of commercial floorspace (Flexible Use Class E(a-f) / F1(a-b) / F2(a-b), together with the provision of associated landscaping, cycle spaces, car parking spaces, formation of new and amended vehicular access off Church Hill Road, public realm improvements and other ancillary works.
decision_conditions: Site levels and finished floor levels
Scheme for wildlife and nesting features
Communal amenity and children play space
